response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This exceptional item is valued at $800,000 by you, and I am excited to extend this offer to you at a special price tailored specifically for you. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. I am confident that this price not only represents a fair market value but also allows for a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
